TransactionStateContext.BettingState: When users place a bet via the `wager` function
TransactionStateContext.ResultState: When the contract processes the bet result through the `play` function
TransactionStateContext.DonationState: When donations are sent to the contract via `donateForContractHealth`

ExternalInteractions.TokenTransfers: Transfers funds to players, owner, bot, and community fund
ExternalInteractions.DonationInteraction: Calls donate() function on the whale address
